pinyin: guang1 xian1 fen1 bu4 shu4 ju4 jie1 kou3
guang1 xian1 fen1 bu4 shi4 shu4 ju4 jie1 kou3
guang1 xian1 fen1 san4 shi4 zi1 liao4 jie4 mian4

sentences.english: The dispersion influence in networks of ultrahigh -speed optical fiber communication is researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了光纖通信網中的色散及其補償方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, the newest developing of plastic optical fiber is reviewed for various communication.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了各種通信用塑料光纖研究的最新進展。

sentences.english: Optic fiber is now the preferred transmission medium for long-haul trunks.
sentences.chinese: 光纖已是長途幹線的首選傳輸媒質。

sentences.english: Fiber magnetic field sensor may be achieved by using Faraday magneto optic effect.
sentences.chinese: 利用法拉第磁光效應可以設計光纖磁場傳感器。

sentences.english: This research provides a guide to the fabrication of practical FRAs.
sentences.chinese: 我們的研究對實際製作光纖拉曼放大器提供了指導。

sentences.english: An MCU-based fuzzy control technique for fiber drawing machines is developed.
sentences.chinese: 文章提出一種基於單片機的光纖拉絲機模糊控制方法。

sentences.english: The network connections and fiber channel connections are shown for reference.
sentences.chinese: 網絡連接和光纖連接也顯示出來以供參考。

sentences.english: The developing tendency of fiberoptic gyro is reviewed at last.
sentences.chinese: 最後，評述了光纖陀螺的發展趨勢。

sentences.english: Line-array fiber-optic image bundles on the contrast transfer function;
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了線列光纖傳像束的對比度調製傳遞函數。

sentences.english: Both Polarization Dependent and Independent Variable Attenuators are possible.
sentences.chinese: 光纖衰減器有極化獨立和非獨立兩種。

sentences.english: Virgin Media has started trials to deliver fibre-optic high-speed broadband over telegraph poles.
sentences.chinese: 維珍傳媒已開始試驗使用電線杆架設高速光纖寬帶。

sentences.english: Introduce the idea and project of CATV fibre-optical netting in urban and rural areas in Ninghua.
sentences.chinese: 介紹寧化縣城鄉有線電視光纖聯網設計思想和方案。

sentences.english: Competing telcos are expanding the reach of FttX-based services.
sentences.chinese: 電信公司的競爭已經延伸到光纖到戶爲基礎的服務。

sentences.english: As the rapid development of optical fiber communication, the demand on silica based single mode fiber (SMF) is increasing dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 光通信迅速發展，對單模光纖的需求急劇增長。

sentences.english: In this paper, a modulation method for carrier channel with large capacity in optical fibre transmission is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了利用光纖傳輸大通路載波信號的調製方式。

sentences.english: The developement of reflective fiber-optic sensors is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 概述了反射式光纖傳感器的發展。
